original_text: God gave his Law to Moses to show more clearly that people were doing wrong things. But when people did more and more wrong things, God continued to be kind in more and more ways.
korean_text: 율법이 들어온 것은 범죄를 더하게 하려 함이라 그러나 죄가 더한 곳에 은혜가 더욱 넘쳤나니

sentences.original_text: God gave his Law to Moses
to show more clearly that people were doing wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 잘못된 일을 하고 있다는 것을 더 명확히 보여주기 위해

sentences.original_text: But when people did more and more wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 사람들이 점점 더 많은 잘못을 저질렀을 때
